text:
Hello!

I tried this function on a standard Excel German date style ("14.4.1998").
This style has got the style id 164 wich will not be recognized as a date.

I don't know how to solve this general problem but the javadoc of this function 
should explain that "false" can mean "unknown date style" too.

Greetings from Germany

   Holger

P.S. Source: jakarta-poi-1.8.0-dev-src.tar.gz
creator: hsapache@online.de

text:
Strange .. 164 (0xA4) is indeed in the list of valid date formats. (see
isInternalDateFormat(int) in HSSFDateUtil. So a cell formatted as such SHOULD
return true to isCellDateFormatted. Maybe some of the other checks in
isCellDateFormatted is failing. Could you please investigate further? Maybe try
out one by one all the checks in the code on your cell?
creator: avik@apache.org
